title: Budget 2024: Industry hails waiving of import duties on critical minerals, calls for reduced GST on EVs
description: The 2024 Union Budget waives import duties on critical minerals like lithium to support the EV industry, potentially reducing battery costs and promoting sustainable transportation. However, industry leaders stress the need to lower GST on EV components to further enhance affordability and adoption rates. The budget also highlights significant investment in job creation and infrastructure.
